Blessed be the Lord day by day, God, our salvation, who carries us.

Psalms 68:20

Sen. Rubio joins @foxandfriends live at 8:00 am to discuss the #PaycheckProtectionProgram and #China. http://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/EY8TUCmXQAA1lS3.jpg https://video.twimg.com/tweet_video/EY8TUCmXQAA1lS3.mp4

HK autonomy allows #China to channel both investments abroad & foreign investment to mainland

Very simple

If HK loses it’s autonomy,China must lose the benefits it receives from HK

This is very disturbing. Why is Google/YouTube censoring Americans on behalf of the CCP? This is WRONG & Big Tech is drunk with power. The Sherman Act prohibits abusing monopoly power. DOJ needs to stop this NOW. https://twitter.com/palmerluckey/status/1265077232176775168 QT @PalmerLuckey YouTube has deleted every comment I ever made about the Wumao (五毛), an internet propaganda division of the Chinese Communist Party. Who at Google decided to censor American comments on American videos hosted in America by an American platform that is already banned in China?

No human being is illegal. Health care is a right that shouldn't depend on immigration status—and my bill recognizes that. https://twitter.com/dcexaminer/status/1263524759184248832 QT @dcexaminer .@CoryBooker's legislation would alter some laws that make it difficult for illegal immigrants and immigrants temporarily in the country to obtain healthcare.

Great news coming out of South Carolina. We must expand vote-by-mail nationwide. My VoteSafe Act would provide states with the resources to invest in vote-by-mail and ensure all voters can safely cast their ballot. 
https://twitter.com/ACLU/status/1264956000089636864 QT @ACLU VICTORY: All South Carolina voters will now have access to vote by mail and won’t need a witness to sign their ballot during the COVID-19 pandemic.

No one should have to choose between their health and their vote.

Even today, the folks deemed as “human capital stock”(aka essential workers) are disproportionately Black, Brown, & low income White folks. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EY9JIgFWAAAa_k-.jpg

No family should have to fight their insurance company over a $2,000 bill for coronavirus treatment.

Our legislation says: We will lift this burden off your shoulders. Medicare will cover all out-of-pocket medical costs for the duration of this crisis. https://www.commondreams.org/news/2020/05/25/3278-er-visit-coughing-fits-and-fever-amid-covid-19-pandemic-highlights-failure

Human Capital Stock.

An ugly term w ugly history, but for many powerful ppl it‘s their most honest view of workers: human stock.

By their logic, the moment a person stops being useful to profit motive (retirement, health, etc) they are a liability. That’s the system we live in. https://twitter.com/atrupar/status/1264996588834996226 QT @atrupar White House adviser Kevin Hassett: "Our human capital stock is ready to go back to work." #HumanCapitalStock http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1264996179588403200/pu/img/7BVKsDCW2ICRWk6Y.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1264996179588403200/pu/vid/480x270/YJAXNli9AjbxPdj1.mp4?tag=10

We are fed up with Black lives being taken. Officers must be held accountable for the excessive use of force that took George’s life.

We need nationwide reform. https://www.washingtonpost.com/nation/2020/05/26/minneapolis-police-death-custody-fbi/

With the highest unemployment rate since the Great Depression, entire industries on the brink of collapse, and many more blue-collar jobs hanging in the balance, Biden’s backwards proposal to end offshore energy production is the last thing Americans need. https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-offshore-drilling-study/u-s-drilling-industry-says-offshore-ban-would-crush-jobs-government-revenues-idUSKBN2320DT

Here's the sad reality: what happened to George Floyd, Ahmaud Arbery & Christian Cooper has gone on for generations to Black Americans. Cell phones just made it more visible.

Dismantling systemic racism in our nation starts with demanding justice & holding offenders accountable.

The @nytimes is right: “It’s time for @SenateMajLdr McConnell to stop his foot-dragging and get serious about making America work again.” https://www.nytimes.com/2020/05/22/opinion/coronavirus-senate-unemployment.html

Fighting for an America that works for all means addressing structural racism head-on.

Community bank @BankWatertown processed 595 #PPPloans valued at $60 million for #smallbiz, saving 8,000 jobs in #JeffersonCounty #NewYork. #PPPworks https://twitter.com/wdtnews/status/1264608348437127169 QT @wdtnews Mark Lavarnway, CEO of Watertown Savings Bank, said the bank processed more applications to local small businesses than any other in the area for the federal Paycheck Protection Program, also known as PPP. https://www.nny360.com/communitynews/business/watertown-savings-bank-steps-up-during-federal-payroll-loan-program/article_a8d2668a-05cc-5f28-8986-0b34111eb8ea.html

The global pandemic is pushing over half a billion people into poverty. Meanwhile the 25 richest people on Earth have increased their wealth by $255 billion. We need international solidarity. We must address the grotesque level of wealth inequality that's getting worse every day.

Our country owes our Puerto Rican servicemembers, veterans, and military families a great debt for their sacrifices for our country. We will not tolerate cowardly acts of vandalism that dishonor their service. https://www.wbur.org/news/2020/05/25/boston-puerto-rican-veterans-memorial-vandalism-investigation
Nearly 100,000 Americans have died from coronavirus and there is still no adequate national testing strategy.

RT @vanitaguptaCR Thank you for introducing the DemocracyCorps Act, @CoryBooker. This common sense legislation will help ensure that more voters will be heard and more ballots will be counted.

If our highest civic duty is to vote, then there should be federal support to encourage it. https://twitter.com/CoryBooker/status/1263829855357022210 QT @CoryBooker Exercising our sacred right to vote should be as easy as possible. I'm proposing that we create a DemocracyCorps which would inspire a new generation of young people to strengthen our democracy by helping Americans safely cast their ballots.
https://thehill.com/homenews/senate/498914-booker-introduces-bill-to-create-democracycorps-for-elections

RT @NASA #LaunchAmerica: We’re sending U.S. astronauts to the @Space_Station on a U.S. rocket from U.S. soil at 4:33pm ET on Wednesday, May 27. Keep “ One Country, Two Systems” on economic matters but create “One Country,One System” on political freedoms

RT @PatrickMcHenry My bill is the House companion to legislation introduced by @SenTedCruz and will remove regulatory barriers, helping states more rapidly respond to public health threats like the #coronavirus.

Today, I introduced the Right to Test Act to address this need and allow states to build their own diagnostic testing capabilities → https://mchenry.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=402606

Companies like @TencentGlobal and @Huawei are espionage operations for the Chinese Communist Party. Soon I’ll formally introduce my Countering Chinese Attempts at Snooping Act to prevent federal employees' use of CCP-linked platforms and protect US intelligence.

What this pandemic has shown is that workers cannot survive on starvation wages. When half our people live paycheck to paycheck, and the paychecks stop coming in, poverty turns into desperation: hunger, homelessness and emotional despair. Every worker deserves a living wage.

Twitter cancel-culture is absurd. It’s not news (or secret) that Fallon was on SNL 20 yrs ago & that they’ve done edgy comedy. (Eddie Murphy’s 1984 “Mr. White” remains a satirical classic.) Let us know when the following are fired: Jimmy Kimmel, Justin Trudeau & Ralph Northam. https://twitter.com/newscomauhq/status/1265208553318445057 QT @newscomauHQ Calls for The Tonight Show star @jimmyfallon to be “cancelled” have erupted on Twitter after a clip of the host in blackface resurfaced Tuesday.

Just justice. 

May it rain down like a mighty river.

Democrats at every level can benefit from NDTC’s free training and resources. Their commitment to helping @TrainDems across the country is what our party needs to be successful in this cycle and for years to come. Check out their weekly virtual trainings: https://traindemocrats.org/events

#GeorgeFloyd should be alive. Instead, he was killed as he begged police for his life.

The impunity of police violence is a systemic problem we must face to save lives.

Police brutality is now a leading cause of death for young Black men in the US. The status quo is killing us.

RT @BrianLehrer .@SenBooker joined us today to talk about a bill he introduced on voting safely during the pandemic, his frustration with the lack of a national response to the COVID crisis & more: https://www.wnyc.org/story/national-politics-senator-booker

RT @SenBooker Over decades, our farm system has become so consolidated that now only a handful of companies control the majority of the food we eat—hurting farmers, workers, and animals. There’s a better way, and that’s what my bill aims to achieve. https://www.ecowatch.com/factory-farming-ban-booker-warren-2645970076.html

RT @YalitzaAparicio "Hola a todos, estoy aquí trabajando para ayudar a mi país a ser menos racista mientras soy tendencia a causa de ello. Aprovecho para compartirles mi primer artículo para el @nytimes, espero que les guste. ¿Cómo va su sábado?" https://www.nytimes.com/2020/05/23/opinion/roma-mexico-workers-rights.html

Over 1.6 million people in the United States have tested positive for coronavirus.
Almost 100,000 have died.
Nearly 40 million Americans have filed for unemployment. 

Trump was briefed on this threat in January. This full-blown public health crisis didn’t have to happen.

We've debated the role of government since our founding—but the time for cheap political shots at government is over. This crisis has shown that a strong, functioning government is essential to saving lives and our economy. And that a lack of one has devastating consequences.

Immigrants who have met every requirement in the naturalization process but cannot attend an oath ceremony because of COVID-19 should not have to wait months to receive their citizenship. @USCIS should adopt tech solutions to get this process moving. https://www.southcoasttoday.com/news/20200525/thousands-wait-to-take-us-citizenship-oath-amid-virus-delays

RT @samswey Three of those four Minneapolis police officers who got fired today were fired because organizers successfully pressured the city in 2016 to adopt a policy requiring officers to intervene whenever they witness another officer using excessive force. #icantbreathe

RT @USOWomen TOMORROW on #StateOfWomenTV — a new @USOWomen Instagram Live series — Senator @KamalaHarris and special guest host @ValerieJarrett are talking about safe and accessible voting for all. Tune in at 5pm ET / 2pm PT! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EY-t5g6XQAgSDm5.jpg

Vermont's enormous lines for food assistance today show just how dire this crisis is, all across America.

No one should be going hungry right now in the richest country on Earth. The federal government has got to provide all the resources we need to protect these families. https://twitter.com/celinetvnews/status/1265370668792717312 QT @CelineTVNEWS Hundreds of cars line up in Burlington, Vermont for the Farmers to Families food drive. We talk to people who waited hours for food to feed their families. Their stories are coming up on @wcax Channel 3 News at 5. @VTNationalGuard   #vermontstrong #fooddrive #Covid_19 http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1265370567303102464/pu/img/uZHR7fkD_KENDLIb.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1265370567303102464/pu/vid/480x270/C5rSZdhpZN_H2vRk.mp4?tag=11

Police shootings are now a leading cause of death for young men *across the board* in the US. For Black men and boys, the risk of being killed by police is *1 in 1,000.*

1 in 1,000. Terrifying and indefensible.

https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2019/08/08/police-shootings-are-leading-cause-death-young-american-men-new-research-shows/

None of us can ignore the systemic racism that continues to plague our country. Not when our Black friends, family, and neighbors still fear dying in the streets. #BlackLivesMatter and we must come together to make that true.

While we fight to expand vote-by-mail, we have to remember that many don’t have that option. For instance, many addresses in Native American communities aren't recognized by USPS.

My VoteSafe Act would ensure in-person voting is safe for all who need it. https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2020/may/22/mail-in-voting-native-americans-election

The law still protects social media companies like @Twitter because they are considered forums not publishers.

But if they have now decided to exercise an editorial role like a publisher then they should no longer be shielded from liability & treated as publishers under the law.

The House has put my #UyghurHumanRights bill on the calendar. We are hopeful it will pass very soon & head to @POTUS for signature to become law. 

Yet another horrifying abuse being perpetrated by the Communist Party of #China

This week @uscensusbureau staff are dropping off Census questionnaire packets at front doors in some areas of Western MA & on the Cape. The dropoffs are being done in a safe, contactless way. Please complete your questionnaire today – it’s important! https://my2020census.gov/
